body_html:
Sorry Till, but we had this discussion in #3229 and the result was that as an interface, it makes sense to only implement one of the two methods.

(If python had the equivalent of a "final" keyword to prevent overriding, we'd be okay with it...)
body_text:
Sorry Till, but we had this discussion in #3229 and the result was that as an interface, it makes sense to only implement one of the two methods.
(If python had the equivalent of a "final" keyword to prevent overriding, we'd be okay with it...)
body:
Sorry Till, but we had this discussion in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/3229 and the result was that as an interface, it makes sense to only implement one of the two methods.

(If python had the equivalent of a "final" keyword to prevent overriding, we'd be okay with it...)
